channel.title: Blogger on Lou Rainaldi
channel.description: Recent content in Blogger on Lou Rainaldi

item.title: Pittsburgh Blogger Facebook Group
item.description: Pittsburgh Blogger Facebook Group Emily over at emilylevenson.com created a new Facebook group for Pittsburgh Bloggers, I joined the group right away. Those who do not know her, she also create Project: Food Budget which I have participate in for helping to manage my family’s food spending. I love the idea of a group for people who blog around Pittsburgh to communicate and get to know each other better. I am a new one to the blogging arena, I am not new to the web or Internet though.
